action.description: The committee on HED recommend that the measure be PASSED, WITH AMENDMENTS. The votes were as follows: 8 Ayes: Representative(s) Garrett, Amato, Evslin, Kapela, Kila, Sayama, Muraoka, Souza; Ayes with reservations: none;  Noes: none; and 3 Excused: Representative(s) La Chica, Olds, Woodson.
